description: Rich salmon and avocado both work perfectly with zingy lime in this easy salad.
name: Mexican-Style Salmon & Avocado Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g hot smoked salmon fillets, with chilli

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Cut each tortilla into 8 triangles. Brush with half of the oil and spread on a baking sheet. Cook for 8-10 minutes, flipping halfway through. Set aside to cool.
Whisk the lime juice, zest and remaining oil together in a small bowl and add the coriander stalks, finely sliced.
Toss the salmon, red onion, sweetcorn, avocado and tomatoes in a large bowl and pour over the dressing. Mix well. Serve with the crispy tortillas and the rest of the coriander on top.
